column5: This apartment is in the heart of midtown. There is not a hotel nor another airbnb that could be closer to where you want to be. This neighborhood is where it is at! You'll find high quality furnishings and a full gym here. A lively pool full of locals, and the best bars/restaurants that the city has to offer. NOTE: Houston locals please read the house rules carefully prior to attempting to book.
column8: Take Three Steps and You're There
